Chapter 6
How to Prepare Time Series Data for
CNNs and LSTMs
Time series data must be transformed before it can be used to ﬁt a supervised learning model.
In this form, the data can be used immediately to ﬁt a supervised machine learning algorithm
and even a Multilayer Perceptron neural network. One further transformation is required in
order to ready the data for ﬁtting a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) or Long Short-Term
